title: First Gear
description:
When an intrepid explorer finds a lost temple, what's inside will change the course of history.
The planet is dying, and yet Jool is convinced there's a way to save its people. The answer lies in a deadly mountain range that no one dares explore, but he doesn't have a choice. The voice in his head proves insistent.With nothing to lose and everything to gain, Jool sets out to find the truth--and almost dies on his journey.When he stumbles upon a hidden temple, he won't just find salvation and a cure for his wife, he'll becomes the first prophet to serve the Mecha Gods.Are you ready for the story of the first gear?
author: Eve Langlais
